name: ARDirectionalLightEstimate
desc: Estimated environmental lighting information associated with a captured video frame in a face-tracking AR session.

items.name: var sphericalHarmonicsCoefficients: Data
items.desc: Data describing the estimated lighting environment in all directions.

items.name: var primaryLightDirection: simd_float3
items.desc: A vector indicating the orientation of the strongest directional light source in the scene.

items.name: var primaryLightIntensity: CGFloat
items.desc: The estimated intensity, in lumens, of the strongest directional light source in the scene.
